LSU baseball's Paul Skenes showed during Friday's game against Tulane in the Baton Rouge regional that he's more than just a shutout arm on the mound.

articles.author: Joey Hickey
articles.title: Texas to play an eight-game SEC schedule in 2024 - Longhorns Wire
articles.description: We should know Texas’ 2024 conference opponents in an SEC Network schedule reveal on June 14.
articles.content:
The SEC announced this week that it would continue to play an eight-game conference schedule in 2024. That’s not great news for the Lone Star Showdown as an annual rivalry.
